channel.title: Install not working at all, I think I've tried everything
channel.description:
I'm trying to install BM, but it isnt appearing in my Steam Library. I have: Installed Source SDK 2007 Extracted the files into the BMS directory Restarted Steam and my PC Tried changing the ID on gameinfo.txt to 215 (apparently that helps)
it still will not show up in my library. Any help?

item.title: Install not working at all, I think I've tried everything
item.dc:creator: Adam-Bomb
item.description:
So it’s fixed then? Excellent! Enjoy!

Read full topic
item.source: Install not working at all, I think I've tried everything

item.title: Install not working at all, I think I've tried everything
item.dc:creator: Astij
item.description:
Crypt:

Specifics? Sounds like the stuff you extracted from those files is actually the installer and whatnot, not the mod files.

Ok nevermind, it turns out i didnt need an extra folder just called BMS

Read full topic

item.title: Install not working at all, I think I've tried everything
item.dc:creator: Astij
item.description:
Adam-Bomb:

That looks correct. The folders do not go sourcemods\bms\bms\ correct? What’s inside your BMS folder?

Just the stuff I extracted from the files on ModDB

item.source: Install not working at all, I think I've tried everything

item.title: Install not working at all, I think I've tried everything
item.dc:creator: Astij
item.description:
Adam-Bomb:
Astij:

I’m trying to install BM, but it isnt appearing in my
Extracted the files into the BMS directory

The BMS directory? The mod needs to be installed into the sourcemods folder. Is that what you meant?

Steam\SteamApps\sourcemods

I heard you had to put in the directory Steam\SteamApps\sourcemods\BMS Should I try just putting it in sourcemods?

Read full topic

Extracted the files into the BMS directory

Steam\SteamApps\sourcemods

item.description:
I’m trying to install BM, but it isnt appearing in my Steam Library.
I have:
Installed Source SDK 2007
Extracted the files into the BMS directory
Restarted Steam and my PC
Tried changing the ID on gameinfo.txt to 215 (apparently that helps)

it still will not show up in my library. Any help?
